content_blocks.section: How does the Information Systems course connect technology and companies?

content_blocks.text: By Renato Penha - Inteli Information Systems Course Coordinator
content_blocks.section: How does the Information Systems course connect technology and companies?

content_blocks.text: Imagine that technology is the language of the future.The Information Systems professional is the translator and architect of this language.They not only understand computers and programming, but know how to apply this technology to solve a company's challenges, optimize processes and create new opportunities.
content_blocks.section: How does the Information Systems course connect technology and companies?

content_blocks.text: In essence, they are the bridge between the complex world of technology and the strategic needs of the corporate world. Someone who understands people, processes and technology to make everything work better.
content_blocks.section: How does the Information Systems course connect technology and companies?

content_blocks.text: At Inteli, our aim is to train not just excellent technicians, but future leaders who will transform Brazil. This means going beyond the code, understanding the impact of technology on society and business.
content_blocks.section: How does the Information Systems course connect technology and companies?

content_blocks.text: Technology at the Service of Business
content_blocks.section: How does the Information Systems course connect technology and companies?
content_blocks.subsection: Technology at the Service of Business

content_blocks.text: We often hear aboutartificial intelligence, Big Dataor theInternet of Things (IoT), and it sounds like something out of a science fiction movie. But on the Information Systems course, you learn how to take these technologies off the drawing board and apply them in a practical way.
content_blocks.section: How does the Information Systems course connect technology and companies?
content_blocks.subsection: Technology at the Service of Business

content_blocks.text: For example, with ourProject-Based Learning (PBL) model,students face real demands from companies. I've seen groups developing digital games to solve organizational challenges, as in Module 01: Digital game, or creating web applications to optimize operations, as explored in Module 02: Application for web environment. It's impressive to see the creativity and problem-solving skills that emerge.
content_blocks.section: How does the Information Systems course connect technology and companies?
content_blocks.subsection: Technology at the Service of Business

content_blocks.text: Another example is the development of IoT solutions, discussed in Module 04, where students learn how to connect devices to collect data and transform the way companies operate. Or the creation ofpredictive models using Deep Learning,as in Module 11, which helps companies anticipate market trends. All of this shows how technology is integrated into everyday business.
content_blocks.section: How does the Information Systems course connect technology and companies?
content_blocks.subsection: Technology at the Service of Business

content_blocks.text: An IS professional needs to have a diverse set of skills: from in-depth technical knowledge of computing to management skills and socio-emotional competencies such as communication and collaboration. After all, you'll be dealing with data, systems and, above all, people.
content_blocks.section: How does the Information Systems course connect technology and companies?
content_blocks.subsection: Technology at the Service of Business

content_blocks.text: The Market Scenario
content_blocks.section: How does the Information Systems course connect technology and companies?

content_blocks.text: The demand for technology professionals is high and growing. Reports from major institutions such as theWorld Economic Forumindicate that the adoption of new technologies will create more jobs than will be eliminated.
content_blocks.section: How does the Information Systems course connect technology and companies?

content_blocks.text: In Brazil, the Brazilian Association of Information and Communication Technology Companies (BRASSCOM) has identified a demand for almost 800,000 IT professionals by 2025. It's a market that offers significant opportunities for those with this strategic and technical vision.
content_blocks.section: How does the Information Systems course connect technology and companies?

content_blocks.text: For me, as a teacher, the greatest reward is seeing our students, from day one, involved in real projects, learning in practice how to turn ideas into solutions. They're not just studying; they're building the future, one prototype at a time.
content_blocks.section: How does the Information Systems course connect technology and companies?

content_blocks.text: Your Future in Information Systems
content_blocks.section: How does the Information Systems course connect technology and companies?

content_blocks.text: If you arecurious about how technology can change companies and society,and see yourself as a leader capable of proposing and implementing innovative solutions, the Information Systems course at Inteli could be the course for you. Get ready for adynamic learningjourney, where theory comes to life in real projects and with each module you become better able to shape tomorrow. How about exploring more about how Inteli can help you build this career?
content_blocks.section: How does the Information Systems course connect technology and companies?
